pl.polsl.lab.worldcupstats.models

Class WorldCupStatsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.worldcupstats.models.WorldCupStatsModel

  • public class WorldCupStatsModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class that stores array of Group objects and performs various operations on them.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Szwajnoch

      • setActualGroupIndex

        public void setActualGroupIndex(int groupIndex)
                         throws WrongGroupIndexException
        Set new index if user changes displayed group (presses "next..." or "previous group" Button)
        Parameters:
        groupIndex - index of actually displayed group
        Throws:
        WrongGroupIndexException - if index is smaller than 0 or bigger that amount of groups

      • resetGroupIndex

        public void resetGroupIndex()
        Sets group index to 0 (first group)

      • addTeamToActualGroup

        public void addTeamToActualGroup(java.lang.String teamName)
                          throws TooManyTeamsException,
                                 TextContainsForbiddenCharsException
        Add new team to currently displayed group
        Parameters:
        teamName - name of team to add
        Throws:
        TooManyTeamsException - if user try to add team to full filled group
        TextContainsForbiddenCharsException - if user try to add team which name conatians of numbers, commas, etc...

        private boolean isTeamNameCorrect(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if String consists of only letters
        Parameters:
        name - String to check
        Returns:
        true if String is only text (no numbers, commas, etc...)

      • areGroupsFull

        public boolean areGroupsFull()
        Checks if every groups has 4 teams
        Returns:
        true if every group has 4 teams (is full)

      • isResultTextCorrect

        private boolean isResultTextCorrect(java.lang.String result)
        Checks if String consists only of numbers
        Parameters:
        result - String to check
        Returns:
        true if String is only digit (no letters, commas, etc...)

      • getActualGroupMatches

        public java.lang.String[] getActualGroupMatches()
        Returns String array of matches of actual group. Form of particular String in array is: "team1 - team2"
        Returns:
        String array of matches of actual group

      • getActualGroupResults

        public java.lang.String[] getActualGroupResults()
        Returns String array of results of actual group. Form of particular String in array is: "score1:score2".
        Returns:
        String array of results of actual group

      • setEachGroupMatches

        public void setEachGroupMatches()
        Sets matches for each of groups

      • setActualGroupResults

        public void setActualGroupResults(java.lang.String[] textFieldsContent)
                           throws TextContainsForbiddenCharsException
        Evaluate user input String array. Checks if confirmed results are ready to set to the matches. If OK then particular results are set to correct matches.
        Parameters:
        textFieldsContent - String array of user input results
        Throws:
        TextContainsForbiddenCharsException - if form of any result String is wrong

      • setActualGroupResultsConfirmed

        public void setActualGroupResultsConfirmed()
        Make actual group results confirmed (sets true)

      • getActualGroupStandings

        public java.lang.String[] getActualGroupStandings()
        Returns String array of actual group standings. Form of particular String in array is: "team1 pointsOfTeam1"
        Returns:
        String array of actual group standings

      • calculateEachGroupTeamsPoints

        public void calculateEachGroupTeamsPoints()
        In every group calculates how many points teams should have
